name: Marabi
description: South African Jazz with origins in the 1920s and rooted in traditional South African music.

children.name: Kwela
children.description: Influenced by Zulu music, characterized by its happy melodies, played by pennywhistle flutes and accompanied by a banjo or a guitar.

children.name: Mbaqanga
children.description: Emerged from the traditional Marabi Jazz and Swing as well as Kwela popular South African genres.
